site_seo.description: MYFA allows you to compose a basket of food goods for your relatives in Ivory Coast!

home_page.seo_title: MYFA, away has never been so close

home.title: For your enjoyment and that of your loved ones in C√¥te d'Ivoire, we deliver in 48 hours
home.subtitle: *COVID-19 : baskets delivery is on hold at this time, but orders are still possible

launch_popup.title: COVID-19 ‚ö†Ô∏è
launch_popup.paragraph1: Due to the current situation, delivery times for MYFA baskets may be longer.
launch_popup.paragraph2: We will be sure to keep you informed as soon as we resume normal activity. In the meantime, stay at home, take care of yourself and your loved ones.

slide2.title: Fill in the information on the recipient of the basket
slide2.description: We call them to determine the delivery conditions.

slide5.title: Delivery in less than 48 hours
slide5.description: Depending on the availability of the recipient.

slide6.title: Follow the route
slide6.description: By email or SMS, stay informed.

baskets.title: Choose your basket!
baskets.subtitle: Our products are in season, coming from producers. The composition of the baskets can therefore vary.
baskets.fruits_basket_description: The Fruits basket brings together up to 6 kilos of flavors that you can share with your loved ones.
baskets.legumes_basket_description: At MYFA, we want to highlight the food crops that are used in local consumption. With this basket, you make your loved ones and the sellers / producers with whom we are in direct contact happy! üòâ
baskets.sauces_basket_description: Any good dish must be accompanied by an adequate sauce. Peanut sauce or Djoumgbl√© sauce ... Allow your loved ones to make them all! üòâ
baskets.myfa_basket_home_description: It's up to you to compose it!
baskets.myfa_basket_description: With this basket, we let you make the composition that best suits your loved ones. You can put a little of each basket and much more!
baskets.ramadan_sugar_basket_home_description: 4 boxes of sugar cubes, concentrated milk, millet grains
baskets.ramadan_sugar_basket_description: During the month of Ramadan, enjoy (or share with your loved ones) this gourmet basket. This 100% sweet basket is ideal for staying in shape.
baskets.ramadan_full_basket_description: During the month of Ramadan, enjoy (or share with your loved ones) this gourmet basket. Ideal for cutting the fast.
baskets.ramadan_fruits_basket_description: During the month of Ramadan, enjoy (or share with your loved ones) this gourmet basket. This basket consists of the seasonal fruits you need!

our_promise.title: Our promise
our_promise.paragraph_title: Ensure your well-being and that of your loved ones.
our_promise.paragraph_description: Sending money to family is good. Make sure they eat is even better.

team.title: The Team
team.doris_description: With MYFA, I wanted to create a way to be able to please, without frustrations. Here I know what becomes of my money.
team.florian_description: Our ambition is to provide a real good solution to the problems caused by distance. We bring families together.
team.alex_description: We offer you a new experience to delight your loved ones and maintain confidence despite the distance!
team.manuella_description: At MYFA, bringing joy to your loved ones is our goal.
